allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
chore: deprecate agent-evolution.sh script

This commit deprecates the agent-evolution.sh script by:
- Adding a deprecation notice at the top of the file explaining the
  reason and date of deprecation (2025-10-20)
- Renaming the file from agent-evolution.sh to agent-evolution.sh.deprecated

Reason for deprecation:
The approach of self-evolving agents through bash scripting proved to be
unpredictable and difficult to control, leading to inconsistent results
and high token consumption. Manual review and iterative refinement
processes provide more maintainable and controllable agent improvements.

This is a non-breaking change - the script is simply marked as deprecated
and should not be used going forward.
EOF
)")
